TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ChannelServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供靜態方法輔助遠端通道登錄、解析和 URL 探索。

span.span: Provides static methods to aid with remoting channel registration, resolution, and URL discovery.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道傳輸這類應用程式定義域、 處理程序，以及電腦的遠端處理界限的應用程式之間的訊息。Channels transport messages between applications across such remoting boundaries as application domains, processes, and computers. 輸入和輸出，可以使用這些交叉。These crossings can be inbound and outbound. 通道可以在端點上接聽傳入訊息，傳送至輸出訊息，或兩者的端點。A channel can listen on an endpoint for inbound messages, send to an endpoint for outbound messages, or both. 這會提供各種不同的通訊協定，插入執行階段中的擴充點，即使執行階段可能無法在另一端的通道。This provides an extensibility point in the runtime to plug in a wide range of protocols, even though the runtime might not be at the other end of the channel. 執行階段物件可用來公開各種不同的語意和實體。Run-time objects can be used to expose a wide range of semantics and entities. 通道會提供擴充點，以將訊息與特定的通訊協定。The channel provides the extensibility point to convert the messages to and from the specific protocols. 通道必須公開介面，提供資訊的屬性，例如和。Channels must expose the interface, which provides informational properties such as the and . 使用註冊通道方法。Channels are registered using the method. 也可以從遠端設定載入通道。Channels can also be loaded from the remoting configuration. (請參閱[\<通道 > 項目 （範本）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)如需詳細資訊。)(See [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce) for details.) 在用戶端中，訊息會遞交給用戶端通道接收鏈結之後通過用戶端鏈結。On the client side, messages are handed off to the client channel sink chain after they traverse the client chain. 第一個通道接收通常是，這會將訊息序列化到通道接收鏈結向下傳遞至用戶端傳輸接收的資料流。The first channel sink is typically a , which serializes the message into a stream that is passed down the channel sink chain to the client transport sink. 然後用戶端傳輸接收會將這個資料流寫出至網路。The client transport sink then writes this stream out to the wire. 在伺服器端，伺服器傳輸接收會讀取網路要求，並將要求資料流傳遞至伺服器通道接收鏈結。On the server side, the server transport sink reads requests off the wire and passes the request stream to the server channel sink chain. 這個鏈結結尾的伺服器格式器接收會將訊息還原序列化要求。The server formatter sink at the end of this chain will deserialize the request into a message. 它會將然後遞交這則訊息到遠端基礎結構，會分派至伺服器鏈結。It will then hand this message off to the remoting infrastructure, which will dispatch it to the server chain.

span.span: Application Domains

is obsolete.
Please use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 已過時。 is obsolete. 請改用 。Please use instead. 方法會採用介面與通道物件。The method takes in the interface from a channel object. 通道的必須是唯一的或必須是匿名的通道。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 通道是匿名如果會設為`null`或是使用`name`組態屬性。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 您無法註冊兩個通道中同名。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 根據預設，名稱是 「 http 」 和名稱是"tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp." 因此，如果您想要註冊的相同類型的兩個通道，您必須指定不同的名稱，其中一個，透過 組態屬性。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱，並[\<通道 > 項目 （範本）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see , and [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/VB/server.vb#1)]

Public Shared Sub RegisterChannel (chnl As IChannel, ensureSecurity As Boolean)

static member RegisterChannel : System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel * bool -> unit

span.span: The channel to register.

param.name: ensureSecurity
param.span: 會確保啟用安全性，否則為 。

span.span: ensures that security is enabled; otherwise .

param.span: 將值設定為 不會影響 TCP 或 IPC 通道上的安全性設定。

span.span: Setting the value to does not effect the security setting on the TCP or IPC channel.

summary.span: 登錄具有通道服務的通道。

span.span: Registers a channel with the channel services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會接收介面與通道物件。The method receives the interface from a channel object. 通道的必須是唯一的或必須是匿名的通道。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 通道是匿名如果會設為`null`或是使用`name`組態屬性。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 您無法註冊兩個通道中同名。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 根據預設，名稱是 「 http 」 和名稱是"tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp". 因此，如果您想要註冊的相同類型的兩個通道，您必須指定不同的名稱，其中一個，透過 組態屬性。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))並[\<通道 > 項目 （範本）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)) and [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). 如果`ensureSecurity`參數設定為`true`，遠端處理系統可讓您判斷是否會實作通道，和如果是的話，可讓加密和數位簽章。If the `ensureSecurity` parameter is set to `true`, the remoting system determines whether the channel implements , and if so, enables encryption and digital signatures. 如果通道不會實作，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the channel does not implement . > [!NOTE] > 設定`ensureSecurity`來`true`會擲回如在 Windows 98 上 (因為 Windows 9 上不支援安全的 tcp 通道 x)，以及所有平台上 (您必須裝載您的服務在 IIS 中，如果您想要使用安全的 http 通道）。Setting `ensureSecurity` to `true` throws a for the on Windows 98 (Since secure tcp channels are not supported on Windows 9x), and for the on all platforms (You must host your service in IIS if you want to use a secure http channel).

span.span: Host the service using Internet Information Services (IIS) if you require a secure HTTP channel.
